data.name: Mad Chess
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD!


CHECK OUT OTHER GREAT CHESS VARIANTS FROM OUR FRIENDS:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1831830/Chessarama/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1151130/Dark_Chess/


About the Game

What is it?

Mad Chess is a game that maintains standard chess rules while adding more than 80 unique fairy chess pieces divided into 13 armies of equal strength. Most armies have the same pawns and kings as classic chess, but the 4 other pieces, while having the same movement patterns, trade their reduced range for special RPG abilities.


This makes Mad Chess easy to learn but hard to master. With 91 match-ups instead of 1, chess just got its biggest expansion pack in centuries. Madness? No. Mad Chess.

Thirteen Factions, including:

  • Humans: Use the classic chess army that you all know with long-ranged units. (Crusader)
  • Mermaids: Bring the ocean with you by covering the chessboard with water. (Geomancer)
  • Angels: Wield the Divine Light which grants protection & situational invincibility. (Paladin)
  • Dragons: Gain necrotic bonuses upon having your units captured. (Necromancer)
  • Vampires: Consume your own troops to gain momentum & disturb enemy units. (Warlock)
  • Fairies: Protect your archers to capture enemies without moving from afar. (Ranger)
  • Yetis: Use devastating beasts that can capture more than 1 unit per turn. (Barbarian)
  • Centaurs: Use military strategies to move enemy units against their will. (Tactician)

Key Features:


  • Adventure: 50+ missions campaign to help Princess Madeline vanquish the Silver Demons.
  • Versus: Play local games against a serviceable AI opponent or another player.
  • Multiplayer: Play public or private games online against other players with custom rules.
  • Shop: Earn gold by playing to unlock additional factions, music, art & special missions.

data.short_description: Mad Chess is a fantasy Expansion Pack to classic chess that adds asymmetric factions to the game such as dragons, vampires & mermaids. Choose between 13 armies based on RPG classes to battle your friends online or in a single-player adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, or 7. 64-bit.
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since about 2010)
  • Storage: 260 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 or newer. 64-bit.
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since 2010)
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
